title: What are the strengths of Socrates’ arguments? - Quora

response.answer_text: His intelligence and wicked sense of Olympian humor combined clever debater’s tricks. For example Socrates took pleasure to humiliate Athenians of repute before the crowd that gathered in the Agora often by using clever debater’s tricks. His wicked Olympian sense of humor had inclined him to find this very funny. Those he bested certainly did not.
